KHOSLQJRWKHUVLQQHHG (672)633-5631 6XQGD2FWREHUWK ROORZLQJ0DVV QWKH3DULVK6RFLDODOO 6LJQXSVKHHWVDUHLQWKHQDUWKH The St Vincent de Paul Truck will be in the Parking Lot after all the Masses on Oct 5th 6th The Thrift Store Accepts the Following Items The Thrift Store accepts new and gently used items that are clean and in good working order Accessories Shoes Belts Scarves Jewelry Handbags Luggage and Backpacks Appliances Artificial Christmas Trees and Seasonal Decorations Books Must be clean free of mold Craft Items Clothing All Sizes and styles All clothing must be clean and free of any damage Convalescent items Walkers Wheelchairs Crutches etc Domestics Linens Curtains Blankets Towels Sheets Comforters Furniture Must be clean and free of any damage Home Dcor items Mirrors Framed Artwork Candlesticks Lamps etc Household goods Dishes Serving Pieces Flatware Pots and Pans etc Office Furniture Office and School Supplies Records and CDs Toys and Stuffed Animals Must be in working order clean and complete For Safety Reasons the Thrift Store DOES NOT accept the Following items Any item that has been recalled by the Consumer Product Safety Commission Please check the Consumer Product Safety Commissions website if you have any questions about your donation Any item in need of repair or not in good working order Ammunition and weapons including replicas Automotive Parts Tires Batteries or Motors Bowling Balls Building Materials Computers Printers and Small Electronic Items Fire Extinguishers Fluorescent Bulbs or Fixtures Hazardous Materials Paints Chemicals Oils and Cleaning Products Industrial Copiers Pianos and Organs Pool Tables Propane Tank Televisions more than five years old Water Beds Upcoming Events in October The Divine Comedy Book Study Mondays October 7th and 21st Parish Conference Room at 6:30PM National Pregnancy and Infant Loss Awareness Memorial Prayer Service Sunday October 13th St Joseph Catholic Cemetery at 2 PM Youth Group Social 7th 12th Grade Tuesday October 16th St Joseph Catholic Church from 7 Pm to 9 PM Theology on Tap Angels and Demons Tuesday October 29th Parlor City Brewery at 6:30PM QLJKWVRIROXPEXV DWKHUORVLXV3KLOOLSVRXQFLO 20
